item.title: CatchLedger
item.description:
CatchLedger helps you keep activity logs organized without clutter.

Highlights

  • Create quick entries for each catch.
  • Keep lightweight notes for location, date, and details.
  • Review your history in one place.

item.title: Contact
item.description: For support, collaboration, or questions, email us at hello@hambungle.com.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Effective Date: 01/15/25
Last updated: 03/31/25

Information We Collect

Spiral Word Puzzle collects a limited amount of user information solely for leaderboard functionality.

  • Authentication Information (Required):
    When submitting a high score, we collect a username or unique identifier to associate scores with players.

  • Country Location (Optional):
    You may optionally choose your country from a list when submitting a high score. This is not automatically collected and is only stored if selected by you.

item.title: Terms
item.description:
By using Hambungle apps and this website, you agree to use them lawfully and responsibly.

We provide our apps as-is and may update, modify, or discontinue features at any time.
